explanation: Multiple participants noted BTC dominance is very high and mentioned BTC is overperforming all other assets in the last 24 hours. Community sentiment flagged strong liquidity absorption at lower levels and expectations of an upward move after periods of sideways action. Some suggest market structure and liquidity sweeps have set the stage for a bullish reversal. Despite a few short-term bearish voices, the majority opinion is that BTC is ready for a takeoff or continued bullish move, with some suggesting long entries and others confirming open long trades and trailing stop losses. No major negative news or sell panic is present; instead, several comments highlight that negative news in the media may be a contrarian bullish signal.
